Name.BusinessNameLine1: THE NEAR AND FAR AID ASSOCIATION INC

IRS990.MissionDescription: THE NEAR & FAR AID, AN ALL-VOLUNTEER FUNDRAISING AND FUND GRANTING ORGANIZATION, IS DEDICATED TO ELIMINATING THE CAUSES AND EFFECTS OF POVERTY IN FAIRFIELD COUNTY. THEY ACCOMPLISH THEIR MISSION BY FINDING AND FUNDING PROGRAMS THAT PROVIDE LIFE'S MOST BASIC NECESSITIES, AS WELL AS THOSE THAT SEEK TO ACHIEVE LASTING CHANGE.
IRS990.Description: PROVIDED MONETARY ASSISTANCE TO NON-PROFIT AGENCIES WHOSE PRIMARY PURPOSE IS TO HELP THOSE WHO ARE LESS FORTUNATE.

RecipientNameBusiness.BusinessNameLine1: THE JEWISH HOME FOR THE ELDERLY
THE COUNCIL OF CHURCHES OF GREAT

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS ALL NEW INCOME BOARD MEMBERS ARE PROVIDED A CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY STATEMENT AMONG OTHER POLICY DOCUMENTS TO GAIN AN UNDERSTANDING OF THE MISSION AND THE POLICIES ON PROVIDING EXCELLENCE IN STEWARDSHIP WHILE CARRYING OUT ITS MISSION. IN ADDITIONA, EXISTING BOARD MEMBERS ARE PROVIDED CHANGES TO POLICY STATEMENTS AND ASKED TO RECONSIDER THE CONFLICTS OF INTEREST POLICY AND ADVISE THEM OF ANY CHANGES.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11: Form 990 Review Process
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A COPY OF THE RETURN IS SUBMITTED TO THE TREASURER, ASSISTANT TREASURER, AND AUDIT CHAIRPERSON FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO THE RETURN BEING FILED.
